009package Ch09_Automatic_Thresholding;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder;
017import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder.Parameters;
018import imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder.RegionType;
019import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
020
021import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.addToDialog;
022import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.askForSampleImage;
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.getFromDialog;
024import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
025
026/**
027 * <p>
028 * ImageJ plugin demonstrating the use of the {@link NiblackThresholder} class.
029 * See Sec. 9.2.2 of [1] for additional details.
030 * 
031 * @author WB
032 * @version 2022/04/01
033 * @see imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive.NiblackThresholder
034 */
035public class Adaptive_Niblack implements PlugInFilter {
036        
037//      enum RegionType { Box, Disk, Gaussian }
038        
039        private static RegionType regType = RegionType.Box;
040        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
041
042        /**
043         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
044         * is currently open.
045         */
046        public Adaptive_Niblack() {
047                if (noCurrentImage()) {
048                        askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Kepler);
049                }
050        }
051        
052        @Override
053        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
054                return DOES_8G;
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
059                if (!runDialog(params))
060                        return;
061                
062                ByteProcessor I = (ByteProcessor) ip;
063                NiblackThresholder thr = NiblackThresholder.create(regType, params);
064                ByteProcessor Q = thr.getThreshold(I);
065                thr.threshold(I, Q);
066        }
067        
068        boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
069                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
070                gd.addEnumChoice("Region type", regType);
071                addToDialog(params, gd);
072                
073                gd.showDialog();
074                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
075                        return false;
076                }
077                
078                regType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(RegionType.class);
079                getFromDialog(params, gd);
080                return true;
081        }
082}
